INSERT INTO courses (course_code, course_name, credits, gpa, subject, term, prerequisite_text, corequisite_text, enrollment_notes, course_description) VALUES ('0505VIRF', 'Health Education - VirSup(Fall)', 0.5, 4, 'Health', 'Semester 1', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'This course is designed to empower students to make healthy choices for their physical, mental, and social well-being. Key topics include nutrition and fitness, stress management, personal safety, disease prevention, substance use awareness, and building positive relationships. Students will also practice decision-making and goal-setting skills that support lifelong health. By the end of the course, students will be better prepared to care for themselves and make responsible choices for a healthy future. NOTE: Parental consent must be provided for students to participate in lessons on human sexuality, child abuse, sex trafficking, dating violence, and family violence. Katy ISD follows an abstinence-only approach in its Health curriculum. Can be taken as an Elective.') ON CONFLICT (course_code) DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO courses (course_code, course_name, credits, gpa, subject, term, prerequisite_text, corequisite_text, enrollment_notes, course_description) VALUES ('0505VIRIDF', 'Health Education - VirInstDay(Fall)', 0.5, 4, 'Health', 'Semester 1', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'This course is designed to empower students to make healthy choices for their physical, mental, and social well-being. Key topics include nutrition and fitness, stress management, personal safety, disease prevention, substance use awareness, and building positive relationships. Students will also practice decision-making and goal-setting skills that support lifelong health. By the end of the course, students will be better prepared to care for themselves and make responsible choices for a healthy future. NOTE: Parental consent must be provided for students to participate in lessons on human sexuality, child abuse, sex trafficking, dating violence, and family violence. Katy ISD follows an abstinence-only approach in its Health curriculum. Can be taken as an Elective.') ON CONFLICT (course_code) DO NOTHING
